text: Giuliano Oberti (born 22 June 1901) was an Italian sailor. He competed at the mixed 6 metres at the 1928 and 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:Sportspeople from Genoa Category:Year of death missing Category:Place of death missing Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 6 Metre Category:Sailors at the 1936 Summer Olympics – 6 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Italy
title: Giuliano Oberti
